articles.author: Patrick Pester
articles.title: Oldest evidence of earthquakes found in strange jumble of 3.3 billion-year-old rocks from Africa - Livescience.com
articles.description: Geologists have found that the rocks of the Barberton Greenstone Belt are similar to those subjected to earthquakes and landslides in New Zealand.
articles.content:
Scientists have found signs of some of the earliest known earthquakes in 3.3 billion-year-old rocks.
The rocks provide early evidence of plate tectonics
, which explains Earth's crust as split into… [+3599 chars]
